query: How might Gulfstream's historical data affect the misrepresentation claim?
output:
CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: How might Gulfstream's historical data affect the misrepresentation claim?

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[(v3) 5. Joe Schuster - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
• Did you ever pick up the phone or request a call to warn them RTS might push to the fall?

[2. Craig Kleebe - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Ask if Gulfstream ever explained to CITIOM that actual downtime might be 6–10x longer

[2. Craig Kleebe - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Was any letter or email sent warning the quote might be off by months or thousands of hours?

[2. Craig Kleebe - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
So you had four full months to alert the customer that the estimates might be wrong—and chose to stay silent?

[Combined_20250505172300.pdf, p.26]
if/when you might be available if this is

[Combined_20250505172300.pdf, p.57]
corrosion at previous removal and/or was any work performed (correctly or incorrectly) that might have

[Combined_20250505172300.pdf, p.58]
involved, were there flows that either we or they might have missed because one of the other parties was

[Combined_20250505172300.pdf, p.121]
incorrectly) that might have contributed to these findings?

[Combined_20250505172300.pdf, p.122]
multiple parties involved, were there flows that either we or they might have missed because

[Murtaza Hassan Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Witness Role: General Manager, Gulfstream St. Louis Service Center

[Murtaza Hassan Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Project: Oversight of 192-month inspection of Gulfstream G550, S/N 5174, from January to November 2024

[Murtaza Hassan Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Ask why he claimed Gulfstream had “no way to assess Aircraft condition” when they did the 144-month check and July 2023 maintenance [ASOC ¶¶ 5–6; CIT00190].

[Murtaza Hassan Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Confirm Gulfstream performed the 144-month inspection in 2020, including stabilizer repairs [ASOC ¶¶ 26–27; Farnham p. 9].

[Murtaza Hassan Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Mr. Hassan, you served as the General Manager of Gulfstream’s St. Louis Service Center in 2024?
